title: Match a custom JsonRpc 2.0 message answer
description: Match a positive or negative server answer

result.description: In case of positive answer, result of the client query

oneOf.$comment: Default return value indicating a success

result.$comment: Note: this field is absent if there is an error

error.description: In case of negative answer, error generated by the client query

oneOf.$comment: The id matching the request id.
If there was an error in detecting the request id, it must be null.

id.$comment: The id matches the request id. If there was an error in detecting the id, it must be null

jsonrpc.$comment: Defined by the parent, but needed here for the validation

$comment: Can contain either a `result` or an `error`. The result can be either a list of messages or `0`.
